alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 30 at 7:05PM MDT until further notice by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest South Dakota, including the following county, Oglala Lakota. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 705 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kyle, Kyle North Route Housing and Pine Ridge Reservation.
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
